Enforce Regularity

Enforces regularity in data frame and xts objects, by turning implicit NAs into explicit NAs. In ts objects, regularity is automatically enforced.

ts_regular(x)

Arguments

x

a ts-boxable time series

Examples

x0 <- AirPassengers
x0[c(10, 15)] <- NA
x <- ts_na_omit(ts_dts(x0))
#> 
ts_regular(x)
#> 
#>            time value
#>   1: 1949-01-01   112
#>   2: 1949-02-01   118
#>   3: 1949-03-01   132
#>   4: 1949-04-01   129
#>   5: 1949-05-01   121
#>  ---                 
#> 140: 1960-08-01   606
#> 141: 1960-09-01   508
#> 142: 1960-10-01   461
#> 143: 1960-11-01   390
#> 144: 1960-12-01   432

m <- mdeaths
m[c(10, 69)] <- NA
f <- fdeaths
f[c(1, 3, 15)] <- NA

ts_regular(ts_na_omit(ts_dts(ts_c(f, m))))
#> 
#>      id       time value
#>   1:  f 1974-02-01   689
#>   2:  f 1974-03-01    NA
#>   3:  f 1974-04-01   677
#>   4:  f 1974-05-01   522
#>   5:  f 1974-06-01   406
#>  ---                    
#> 139:  m 1979-08-01   975
#> 140:  m 1979-09-01    NA
#> 141:  m 1979-10-01  1081
#> 142:  m 1979-11-01  1294
#> 143:  m 1979-12-01  1341
